entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending before morning then mainly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 10:26 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
